text:
Hi, 

I have tomcat 3.2.3 configured with apache 1.3.27. Tomcat appears to be sending 
incorrect content header length for jsp files it processes.

Can anyone tell me if this is a bug, or a misconfiguration of my tomcat 
deployment.

K.
creator: quasimm@hotmail.com
funkman@joedog.org
text:
(Even though I don't use tomcat 3) Please provide test case to reproduce. The
writeup is too vague to provide help.

creator: hgomez@apache.org
text:
Tomcat 3.2.3 is deprecated, so you should switch to tomcat 3.3.1a for Servlet 
2.2/JSP 1.1 implementation, or use Tomcat 4.1.24 for 2.3/1.2
